item.title: Beogram 4002 (Type 5513): Replacement of Carriage Position Sensor Photocell
item.description:
Over many years of working with the Beogram 400x, I’ve encountered a wide array of issues, but these turntables never cease to present new challenges. In this instance, a Beogram 4002 exhibited inconsistent behavior when attempting to locate the record’s setdown point after pressing start. This pointed to a potential fault in the carriage position sensor. Initially, I suspected the IR LED, a common culprit in later models like this 5513 Type...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-type-5513-replacement-of-carriage-position-sensor-photocell/

item.title: Beogram 4002 (Type 5513): A New Arrival From California - First Impressions
item.description:
I recently began working on a Beogram 4002 Type 5513 from California, which needs a complete technical overhaul. This post will provide an initial evaluation of the unit. It was delivered in excellent shape thanks to the customer’s careful packaging in a Beolover-provided shipping container. I was relieved because this device is in fantastic cosmetic shape. In the past, Beolover had a lot of “heartbreaking” experiences with units that arrived damaged because of inadequate packaging despite initially seeming pristine...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-type-5513-a-new-arrival-from-california-first-impressions/
